FE.name: Host
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Host</fen> is the individual (or group of individuals) that own or control the <fen>Residence</fen> and allow the <fen>Lodger</fen> to temporarily stay there.</def-root>

FE.name: Lodger
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Lodger</fen> is the individual who is given permission to lodge in the <fen>Residence</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Circumstances
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Circumstances</fen> are the conditions under which the <fen>Host</fen> provides lodging.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Time</fen> is when the <fen>Host</fen> provides a Residence to the <fen>Lodger</fen></def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Place</fen> is where the <fen>Host</fen> provides a temporary <fen>Residence</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Purpose
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Purpose</fen> is the goal of the <fen>Host</fen> in allowing the <fen>Lodger</fen> to stay.</def-root>

FE.name: Reason
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Reason</fen> is the cognitive cause of the <fen>Host</fen>'s granting of permission.</def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition: <def-root>Any description of the provision of lodging which is not covered by more specific FEs, including secondary effects (<ment>quietly, loudly</ment>), and general descriptions comparing events (<ment>the same way</ment>). In addition, it may indicate salient characteristics of the <fen>Host</fen> that also affect the action (<ment>presumptuously, coldly, deliberately, eagerly, carefully</ment>). </def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition:
<def-root>An action of the <fen>Host</fen> whereby they communicate or enact the granting of permission to stay in the Residence.
<ex></ex></def-root>

FE.name: Residence
FE.definition: <def-root>The location controlled by the <fen>Host</fen> which the <fen>Lodger</fen> stays at temporarily.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: house.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: provide with shelter or accommodation.

lexUnit.name: host.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: act as a host to in-house visitor's.

lexUnit.name: put up.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: provide a guest with accomodation.
